items.title: Clickable IP Links in Repeater Details
items.description: AllStar and EchoLink nodes in the repeater detail modal are now clickable. AllStar links open the AllStar Stats page, and EchoLink links open the RepeaterBook node status page.

items.title: Enhanced Repeater Detail Modal
items.description: Improved repeater detail modal with visual indicators for clickable IP links, including external link icons and hover effects for better user experience.

items.title: Code Reorganization & Optimization
items.description: Eliminated ~450 lines of duplicate code through centralized configuration (config.js), shared utilities (utils.js), and modular architecture. Organized JavaScript and data files into logical directories.

items.title: Enhanced Spotter Activation System
items.description: Implemented three-level urgency system (standard/enhanced/PDS) with automatic detection from NWS Hazardous Weather Outlook. Visual indicators help spotters quickly assess activation status.

items.title: Improved Error Handling
items.description: Added defensive error handling, cache diagnostics, and robust fallbacks for configuration loading and API calls. Better reliability during severe weather events.

items.title: Unified Dashboard
items.description: Consolidated alerts into comprehensive spotter dashboard with HWO, activation status, all active alerts, and quick access to 6 essential weather maps.

items.title: Component Architecture
items.description: Implemented dynamic header and footer components with integrated theme toggle and navigation system for easier maintenance across all pages.

items.title: Sticky Navigation
items.description: Page navigation now remains visible while scrolling with glassmorphism effects for easier access to page sections during severe weather events.

items.title: Unified Button Design
items.description: Consistent styling across all interactive elements with enhanced hover effects, smooth transitions, and improved accessibility.

items.title: Complete CSS Refactor
items.description: Mobile-first redesign with CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts, improved accessibility with ARIA attributes, and semantic HTML5 structure.

items.title: Dark Mode Support
items.description: Automatic light/dark mode based on system preferences with custom theme toggle button and smooth transitions between themes.

items.title: Enhanced Mobile Navigation
items.description: Improved mobile hamburger menu with better touch targets, accessibility features, and dual navigation system (site-wide and page-specific).
